text: Allahale yi momin (asthavana) purusaharu ra momin striharusita svargako vacana di'eko cha jasamuni naharaharu bagirakheka hunechan, jasama uniharu sadhaim basa garnechan ra pavitra nivasa grhaharuko pani (vada) cha, juna samapta nahunevala jannatama chan ra allahako prasannata sababhanda thulo kura ho, yahi nai sababhanda thulo saphalata ho
